page.title: 10LEISURE FACILITIES IN ONGAR
page.content: Leisure facilities in Ongar are quite varied for adults, but there is really only the Haunt and Ongar Sports Centre for teenagers. Organisations like Brownies and Cubs (plus the Sports Centre) are for those of primary age. The Sports Centre provided the most popular leisure activities for families in Ongar but other popular activities were those at the Budworth Hall (musical, artistic and dramatic). However, most people did not use any facilities in the local area at all. Nor did they go elsewhere, so it seems either not all tastes are catered for, or people do not realise what is available. When asked what is needed in Ongar the most popular answer was better shops along with more car parking, a cinema and a better bus service.
